scenario_text.value: That wasn’t that tough.

Jeez... This isn’t the time for us to be
fighting, you know.

Tell me about it. They might’ve gotten to
Kaito, too...

We’d better hurry. Let’s go check out the
underground waterway.
Uh, Minoru...?
What?

(Rrk, he suddenly stopped. Now he’s waiting
for me to spit out what I was gonna say.)

(I understand wanting to search unexplored
areas to find Kaito.)

(But the underground waterway was so
dangerous...)
(I can’t help but be worried.)
(Should I let Minoru go in the waterway?)
Let him go.
Stop him.
Go with him.
Let him go.
Sorry. Never mind. Just be careful, okay?

Thanks, man! I’ll be fine. I mean, I’ve got
Falcomon with me, right?
I just wanna find him as soon as I can.

Stay calm and don’t get carried away. I’ll be
doing the same.
Well said. See you two later then!
If anything happens, just call for us!
Stop him.

Don’t you think that’s dangerous? Think about
everything that happened there.

I mean, sure, but this is no time to be
a worrywart.

I’ll be fine with Falcomon here! Isn’t that
right?

I get that it might seem risky, but we’ll be
super careful, I promise!

You should have more belief in our abilities,
man!

I think the two of them will be just fine,
Takuma.
I guess so... Maybe I was worrying too much.

All righty! We’ll come back ASAP if we find
anything!
Go with him.

Me and Agumon are coming with you. The
underground waterway isn’t safe.

I get that it might sound risky, but
splitting up would actually save time, no?
Yeah, I guess...

We’ll be fine! You should be worried about
Kaito, not us!

But still... Thanks for wanting to make sure
we’re safe, man.

No problem. Just let us know if anything
happens.

Don’t worry, I’m not gonna risk my life over
nothing.
If things get dicey I’ll run right back here.
See ya later!
Good luck, you two!
